publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3172 Fergus Ewing: Anagach Woods—That the Parliament welcomes the purchase of Anagach Woods by the community of Grantown-on-Spey; congratulates everyone involved in ensuring that the community purchase will be successfully completed; acknowledges support from the Scottish Land Fund and Highland and Islands Enterprise Community Land Fund, and hopes that the safeguarding of these woods will safeguard the environment and also provide opportunities for Grantown-on-Spey in the years ahead.
S1M-3172 Anagach Woods (lodged on 5 June 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Matheson*

S1M-3172 Fergus Ewing: Anagach Woods—That the Parliament welcomes the purchase of Anagach Woods by the community of Grantown-on-Spey; congratulates everyone involved in ensuring that the community purchase will be successfully completed; acknowledges support from the Scottish Land Fund and Highland and Islands Enterprise Community Land Fund, and hopes that the safeguarding of these woods will safeguard the environment and also provide opportunities for Grantown-on-Spey in the years ahead. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Michael Matheson
S1M-3172 Anagach Woods (lodged on 5 June 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3172 Anagach Woods (lodged on 5 June 2002) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3172 Anagach Woods (lodged on 5 June 2002) Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-3172 Anagach Woods (lodged on 5 June 2002) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
